Cache Download

Source: R/cache_download.R
cache_download.Rd

Cache Download

Usage

cache_download(
  url,
  ...,
  use_memory = TRUE,
  use_disk = TRUE,
  bust_cache = FALSE
)

Arguments

url

The URL to download from.

use_memory

Whether to use memory caching.

use_disk

Whether to use disk caching.

bust_cache

Whether to bust (refresh) the cache.

Examples

cache_download("https://s3.amazonaws.com/quartzdata/datasets/caserates-by-age.csv")
#> # A tibble: 116 × 11
#>    `0 - 4` `5 - 11` `12 - 15` `16 - 17` `18 - 29` `30 - 39` `40 - 49` `50 - 64`

options("tidyiddr_use_cache" = TRUE)
cache_download("https://s3.amazonaws.com/quartzdata/datasets/caserates-by-age.csv")
